abilities.name: Ether Shock
abilities.description: Shadow Shaman releases a bolt of electricity that strikes multiple enemy units, dealing damage to each.
abilities.notes: Jumps to the nearest enemies in range. The primary target is always hit.

abilities.name: Hex
abilities.description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless creature, disabling its attacks and abilities.
abilities.notes: Hexed units are transformed into frogs, slowed, and unable to attack or cast spells.

abilities.name: Shackles
abilities.description: Shaman channels magical energy, causing stuns and damage to the target enemy unit over time.
abilities.notes: Channeling ability that damages and disables the target as long as Shadow Shaman continues channeling.

abilities.name: Mass Serpent Ward
abilities.description: Summons 8 Serpent Wards in a perimeter around the target point. The wards attack enemy units and structures.
abilities.notes: Serpent Wards deal physical damage and are especially effective against structures.
